author: gates
msg: Changed ExecutionEngine.compile implementations and PigServer to work with the new way logical plans are stitched together.

author: jcompagner
msg: - speeds up the rendering of the autocomplete menu list;
- speeds up the initial assignment of events (onclick and onmouseover) to items in the menu list;
- fixes a small glitch in setting the height of the menu container (eventual padding and margins were ignored and so the height resulted smaller than needed -> vertical scrollbar appeared)
